channel.title: ::Pure

item.title: ::Pure
item.dc:creator: @Hexyl Hexyl
item.description:
@Hexyl wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:2, topic:292142”]declare:

public boolean gotPure = false;

then change your command to:

		if (command.startsWith("pure"))
	{
             if(!gotPure) {
			addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
               } else {
                       sendMessage("You already got your pure!");
	}

And make gotPure save if you want[/quote]lmfao that has no effect. as your not setting the statement true, so it wont register that you have recieved any exp

declare

public boolean gotPure = false;

and use this command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")){
    if(!gotPure)
        gotPure = false;
        int ids[] = {0,2,3,4,6};
        for (int i; i < ids; i++)
        addSkillXP(14000000, i);
    else
        sendMessage("You already got your pure!");
    }

Read full topic

item.title: ::Pure
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

declare:

public boolean gotPure = false;

then change your command to:

		if (command.startsWith("pure"))
	{
             if(!gotPure) {
			addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
               } else {
                       sendMessage("You already got your pure!");
	}

And make gotPure save if you want

item.title: ::Pure
item.dc:creator: @victorfan12 victorfan12
item.description:
@victorfan12 wrote:

Hello

I need to make a pure command. And I have! But the problem is you can just spam ::pure and get your levels up past 99.

Source: Project16 V.6

		if (command.startsWith("pure"))
	{
			addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
			addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
	}

Any help on how to stop this :\

Read full topic
